column5: Does anyone know if LOB is safe for ice fishing yet? TIA< P.
I don't know that body of water but there was a solid 4 inches of ice right here in Guelph, maybe a bit more
Where are you fishing in Guelph Rizzo?

Those northern muskoka lakes usually freeze up late, and its been mild. Check the satellite views and see.  https://worldview.earthdata.nasa.gov/?v=-80.89900582963331,44.028951230569994,-77.78746108182732,45.60633155411053&t=2020-12-29-T08%3A00%3A00Z  looks wide open to me. along with simcoe and the other Muskoka lakes.
I will check with my cousin but doubt LOB's has safe ice.
Not on Guelph Lake...just a local pond. Although I think there are some people trying parts of Guelph Lake. Guys have been fishing Belwood as well
Ya...ice is nowhere near good up north. Tiny baxk lakes have about 4-5 and anything else is basically open. I doubt lake of bays has ice at all too be honest
time to get the boat out apparently!
